'''Function and other keys'''

All keys work, except for one with a wireless icon (which theoretically allows to disable bluetooth OR wifi), and its three touch sensitive keys (Smart Key Button, WOW Audio Button and WOW Video Button).

==== Notes ====

* The screen goes black but the laptop remains powered on. After switching it of (pressing the power-off button for 10 seconds) and starting it again everything is restored like it was before.

* * Sound failed after suspend, but this is fixed by creating a file called "/etc/modprobe.d/sound" containing this one line:  "options snd-hda-intel model=tohsiba". Additionally, in case the microphone doesn't work don't forget to change "Input Source" to "Front Mic" in the sound applet.

* ** Needs manual installation of [http://www.pdfserver.net/fingerprint fingerprintGUI] (32 bit version with the binary UPEK driver).

* *** Initially it only worked if a card was inserted at boot time, but for some reason now it is working fine.
